venue.address_2: Mammoth Rd. & S. Willow also called Rt.28A Manchester
venue.name: The Yard Seafood & Steak House

item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The May Brunch of the month is the Yard Seafood and Steakhouse.

About the Brunch of the Month:

Welcome to the award winning Yard Seafood & Steak House Restaurant. Our vision is simple and focused: quality of service, New England hospitality, and affordable prices. What began some 30 years ago as the favorite family restaurant is now an extraordinarily successful full service restaurant, lounge, functions, and lodging complex servicing Manchester's ever growing and vibrant business community. And at the core of the complex stands The Yard Seafood & Steak House.

http://www.theyardres...

Menu:

Serving Omelets - Cooked to Order!!

Starters
Fresh Fruit and Cheeses. Yard baked breads, toast, fresh pastries, donuts, croissants, bagels, muffins, cinnamon rolls, french toast, pancakes served with strawberries, maple syrup and whipped cream, eggs benedict, scrambled eggs, home fries, bacon and breakfast sausage.

Hot Buffet Items
Hot Soup du Jour, Chef carved Roast Sirloin, Baked Virginia Ham, Fresh Roast Turkey served with gravies, au jus, and raisin sauce, Chef's Rice, and Potato du Jour.
A gourmet presentation of entrees each Sunday, for example...
Seafood Newburg, Swedish Meatballs, Lasagna with meat sauce, Seafood stuffed Mushroom Caps, BBQ Beef Ribs and more...

Desserts
A lavish and luscious display of Yard baked cakes, pies, cookies, puddings and our renowned "make your own" strawberry shortcake.

http://www.theyardres...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: FAN Brunch of the Month
